body:
The pinning to 1.10.8 broke CMake detection logic for parallel binary variants of HDF5. I roll the `preferred` pinning back to `1.10.7` until the maintainers spot and can patch the problem.

Reverts #27613 by @lrknox 

X-ref new issues from 1.10.8 pinning:
- #28074
- #28083
- https://github.com/HDFGroup/hdf5/issues/1320
title: HDF5: Prefer 1.10.7
